## TransactableLiquity.registerFrontend() method

Register current wallet address as a Liquity frontend.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerFrontend(kickbackRate: Decimalish): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  kickbackRate | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The portion of OPL rewards to pass onto users of the frontend (between 0 and 1). |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./lib-base.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.
